item.title: A review of the log trucking workforce and comparisons to other industries
item.description: The trucking industry is faced with a number of challenges, including recruiting workers, pending retirements, and an increase in demand due to e-commerce sales. These slides provide an overview of the log trucking workforce and were presented at the Forest Resources Associationâ€™s Fall Board Meeting in Portland, ME. READ THE SLIDES.
